name: Big Mountain Snowboarding
description:
Big Mountain Snowboarding comes to Mac! Use multitouch or keyboard and mouse to control a snowboarder down 16 huge crazy slopes with realistic controls.

Touchpad:
* Two finger swipes to control the snowboarder
* Swipe up to jump
* Swipe left or right to turn
* Use a third finger to tuck or grab.

Mouse:
* Hold down left button and move left/right to turn
* Right button to tuck/grab
* Swipe upwards or spacebar to jump

Keyboard:
* Arrow keys to move/tuck/jump.
